name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: secondz - Generate user guide in seconds

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply operate the screen as usual to generate a manual guide with instructions. Anyone can easily create, share and analyze them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create interactive guides with secondz .
Easily share your guides with your team and customers through chat tools, mail and more, or embed them in tools.

With secondz, create various guides such as how-to guides, training manuals, process documentation, SOPs, support guides, and more.

secondz is free to use and can be upgraded for more functionality.

â– What problems does secondz solve?

ğŸ˜¢ Guide creation is taking a long time.
ğŸ†— secondz create guides in seconds.

ğŸ˜¢ Video tools are hard to use and edit.
ğŸ†— secondz automatically generates interactive guides like video and easy to edit.

ğŸ˜¢ Documentation makes it difficult to understand how to use digital tools.
ğŸ†— With secondz, you can create interactive guides. It's easy to understand visually!
 
ğŸ˜¢ PDFs and videos are outdated almost immediately, creating confusion and more work.
ğŸ†— secondz are simple to edit and any embeds or links shared are automatically updated.

ğŸ˜¢ I don't know if you've seen the guide I've created.
ğŸ†— secondz allows you to track people's view status.
